resources.string:
Professional Overview:


Khaled is a dedicated software developer with a passion for mobile app development. He specializes in React and React Native, creating dynamic and user-friendly applications. Khaled has recently expanded his expertise to Android development, learning Kotlin through a Udacity Nanodegree program. 
 
 Experience: 
 
 • Developed and maintained multiple mobile applications using React Native.

• Integrated Firebase and various APIs to enhance app functionality. 
 • Implemented multilingual support, including Arabic translations, in mobile apps. 
 • Gained foundational knowledge in blockchain and cryptocurrencies. 

Skills: 
 

• React and React Native 
 • TypeScript and JavaScript 
 • Firebase Integration 
 • Android Development (Kotlin) 
 • Localization and Internationalization 

Personal Interests: 
 

• Passionate about learning new technologies and improving his development skills. 
 • Enjoys watching the television series “House” to improve English proficiency. 
 • Enthusiastic about travel, influenced by his fiancée’s love for exploring new places. 

Current Focus: 
 
 Khaled is currently preparing interview questions for front-end developer candidates and is working on projects that involve both mobile and web development.
